sentences.en: Alternatively it may be solely a method of forming a suitable background for painting.
sentences.cn: 也可能是为了使油漆有个适宜底面.

sentences.en: Alternatively the gels may be destained electrophoretically.
sentences.cn: 凝胶脱色的另一方法是电泳法.

sentences.en: Alternatively, a reflective type of adhesive containing aluminium powder may be used.
sentences.cn: 此外, 也可采用含有铝粉的反射型粘接剂.

sentences.en: Alternatively, reefs may extend linearly across basins.
sentences.cn: 此外, 礁可横穿盆地呈带状延伸.

sentences.en: Alternatively, the President may issue administrative orders directing responsible parties to take protective action.
sentences.cn: 替代性的办法是, 总统可以颁布行政命令,责令责任方采取保护性措施.

sentences.en: Alternatively, the same information may be repeated within the sound track.
sentences.cn: 另外, 同样的信息可能会重复在健康的轨道.

sentences.en: Alternatively, there could be a surge in net exports.
sentences.cn: 另一种情况是净出口的大幅增长.

sentences.en: Alternatively, we can look directly at measures of unused business capacity.
sentences.cn: 或许我们可以直接利用闲置的企业产能.

sentences.en: Alternatively, we may invert the file.
sentences.cn: 换一种方法, 我们可以将此文件倒排.

sentences.en: Alternatively, you can submit an enquiry by filling in the below.
sentences.cn: 此外, 您亦可以在以下填写及提交您的查询.

sentences.en: His action was alternatively vivacious and sullen.
sentences.cn: 他的举动时而轻松愉快,时而阴沉古怪.

sentences.en: Hotels are generally of a good standard and not too expensive. Alternatively you could stay in an apartment.
sentences.cn: 旅馆一般标准高并且不太贵。或者你可以住公寓。

sentences.en: The experiments can be developed alternatively along two lines.
sentences.cn: 实验可沿着两个方向之一开展.

sentences.en: The RVT can alternatively be connected directly to the Ground Control Station.
sentences.cn: RVT能做为选择直接连接到地面控制站.

sentences.en: We could take the train or alternatively go by car.
sentences.cn: 我们可以坐火车去,也可以坐汽车去.

sentences.en: You could, alternatively, hang onto it in the hope that it will be worth millions in 10 years time.
sentences.cn: 或者，你也可以留着它，指望10年以后它能值个几百万。

二中择一；供替代的选择

trans.tran_cn: 二者择一地，要不然，或者
trans.tran_en: You use alternatively to introduce a suggestion or to mention something different from what has just been stated.
